verbs.description: < p > [V: Am] [ARG1: I] [ARG2: the only person who has noticed that a large portion of North Korea is not on the peninsula] ? So when Kim and Trump say they want a “ nuclear - free Korean Peninsula , ” what are they asking for?</p >

< p > Am I the only person who [V: has] noticed that a large portion of North Korea is not on the peninsula ? So when Kim and Trump say they want a “ nuclear - free Korean Peninsula , ” what are they asking for?</p >
